turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How are you Grace today, I would like to order me some coffee from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am fine Sir. Which is your prefered store where I should make the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Granbury store, I like there coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which is your preferred Flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will appreciate if you got me caffe Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice choice, tried it once and it did not disappoint.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am a lady with taste as I always tell you young lady.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: By the way have you tried Caramel Macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, once it is nice but I will prefer caffe latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As you say, Reason I chose you as my assistant

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Don't make me ask for a raise

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Heey! get serious, let me not come and miss my drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am working on it. At what time do you want the coffee delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 9 am will be okay with me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately 9 am is not possible, you either take 930am or 830am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem, do 830am

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Order confirmed. You will receive a payment notification through sms

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Heard my phone vibrate, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Welcome
